text: Ancelle is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department and Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region in southeastern France. == Transport == === Road === The D13, D213 and D514 roads pass through Ancelle. The N94 road by-passes Ancelle. == Geography == The landscape of the Ancelle commune is very hilly, as it is on the outskirts of the Écrins National Park. The Rouanne River passes through the village. == References == Category:Communes in Hautes-Alpes
title: Ancelle
